Crete, the floating archipelago over the sky, was attacked by mysterious forces, and all the element energies became chaotic so that they couldn't be use by the Energy Crystal, the core energy supply device of Crete. With the lack of energy, the Energy Crystals began to dim, and Crete was on the verge of collapse. At this moment, six element pixies appeared on the Mini Island at the bottom of Crete. Their abilities to manipulate elements brought hope to Crete. Now, the pixies need your help. Make full use of the pixies' abilities to match the messy elements, create powerful magic booster, solve puzzles, rebuild Crete and go to a higher sky. Maybe you will get the chance to touch Ouranos, the secret legend above the sky.
